actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Concurrent resolution commending the American Song Festival as an important addition to the cultural life of the United States and paying tribute to the songwriters of the world.

summary.text: States that the Congress commends the American Song Festival as an important addition to the cultural life of the United States and pays tribute to the songwriters of the world.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution commending the American Song Festival as an important addition to the cultural life of the United States and paying tribute to the songwriters of the world.
